The stated purpose of this practice is to reduce tooth decay by strengthening tooth enamel. However, the truth is that ingesting fluoride through drinking water poses significant health risks that have been systematically downplayed and ignored.

There is mounting evidence that fluoride consumption can lead to a wide range of adverse health effects. Numerous studies have linked fluoride exposure to decreased IQ in children, as well as increased risk of neurodevelopmental disorders like ADHD. Fluoride has also been shown to damage the thyroid gland, disrupt the endocrine system, and even cause bone fractures and dental fluorosis, a condition that discolors and weakens teeth.

The fact is that the benefits of fluoride are primarily topical, meaning they come from direct contact with the teeth, not from ingestion. There is no scientific justification for adding this toxic substance to our drinking water. It's a blatant violation of our right to informed consent and puts the health of millions at risk.

The pro-fluoride lobby, backed by powerful interests in the dental and pharmaceutical industries, has worked hard to suppress and discredit any evidence that contradicts their agenda. But the truth is slowly coming to light, and more and more communities are waking up to the dangers of water fluoridation. It's time to put an end to this outdated and dangerous practice and protect the health of future generations.
